subSubSection.paragraph:
Paratypes :
1 lot, 5 specimens —NUP 5950, 5, 41.6–49.1 mm SL, Guyana , Mazaruni river drainage, sandy beach and embayment on right bank, upstream from village of Jawalla , 5°41’35.4” N , 60°28’11.8” W , H. López-Fernández, D.C . Taphorn, E . Liverpool, K . Kramer, C . Thierens,
18 Apr 2008
.
